text.section: The statement required under subsection (a) of this section shall also contain, in bold-faced type, a statement that a seller may not be prohibited from offering owner financing as a condition of settlement.
A real estate contract is not rendered invalid by the omission of the statement to the buyer required under subsections (a) and (b) of this section.
